reviews.review_msg: George has poor organization. He lost 2 of our quizzes in the semester, posts nothing on canvas, requires you to go to his office for questions, and criticizes students. I had to email him THREE times to get marks back from assignments 2 months ago, just to find out they haven't been market yet. You'll do yourself a favor by avoiding George.

During lectures he just talks and rarely writes notes down. Really unorganized and doesn't update canvas frequently. Can barely form proper questions and sentences on problem sets. Only uploaded notes once and there were literally 6 lines and they were all useless. All his exam and assignment questions do not make any sense. Avoid him at all costs.
In general, nice teach but his notes are horrible, need to organize more, especially for the class materials.
Cool and fun guy~ but needs to improve his organizational skill! His notes and his hand-writing are poor!!
